articles.author: Ben Dreith
articles.title: Apple releases Vision Pro "spatial computer" headset - Dezeen
articles.description: Apple has released its Vision Pro headset, a wearable device that allows users to control a 3D environment with eye and hand movements
articles.content:
Technology company Apple has released its Vision Pro headset, a wearable device that allows users to project visual applications in a 3D environment controlled by eye and hand movements.
